TopicTitle: You must use the object that is in your left hand to survive a thermonuclear war

Articles.Content: My bed this well i could hide under the covers.
My Phone! Call for help, QUICK!
Infernal radioactive ipad.
Pizza... oh well, i guess it's gonna be tasty.
A lamp. At least I'll be able to see my slow, searing death.
A half full water bottle? Well this 750ml of carbonated water will sure help me.

A lollipop, a lollipop. I guess I could make it pointy and stab people

Edited February 23, 2014 by CaptainGiblets
O great, A can of WD-40. Well I guess I could cut it up and turn it into an emergency stove, and the WD-40 should burn just fine as fuel. I don't know what I'll be eating though :/
a tissue box, pessimistcally, I would put my head in it... or optimistically I would attempt to sue it to filter my breath, but really its useless.....
A 4x4 Rubik's cube? I guess I won't be bored.
a chair? i guess i can hide under it and hit people with it
my metalwork ash pan... hmmmm... not exactly made well... i guess i could... screw it, its useless, unless i'm going to clean up afterwards...
A banana...guess I have some food.

My nexus 7

Umm.. I can go to the KSP forums and play the forum games!
hmm a pen, i guess i can poke people's eyes out and write down a note to identify my body
A cpu HUUUU I guess I could choke some one with it.
My head? I do intend to use my head in the event of a nuclear war. ;D

My green glass of grapefruit juice.

At least I can hope it will magically expand into a radiation-proof shield.

A bottle of lemonade Kombucha.

.
A slightly used laptop with a dying battery well why the crap not

My spine.

tencharacterdevelopment

My head...

I can think up a way to win using cookies.

Well, crud.

I got nothing.

In me left hand, i have.................

Uh...

Repopulation?
I'm a freaking Flareon... I can withstand loads of heat!
